amendment.description: On page 44, line 23, after the dollar amount, insert "(increased by $160,000,000)". ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds for the Department-Wide Programs (Indian Affairs) by $160,000,000. And, to reduce funds for the National Endowment for the Arts by $60,000,000.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Lamborn amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Lamborn.
